Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Pendant
Description: Small pendant with a classic New Kingdom shape, most probably representing a plant. It can be described (from bottom to top) as having a flared base, a bulbous mid-section, and a vertical stem which is pierced crosswise at the upper extremity.  One of the surfaces is rounded, the other is flat.
